name: Beat 'm Up
description:
This is a little game I made as a test to see whether it would be fun to put a fighting game on a beat, like Crypt of the Necrodancer. The answer: Not really! This project is still a bit buggy, since it's the first project I ever programmed myself, but, if I haven't put you off too much, enjoy the game and let me know what you think!

2 Players required!!

How to play:
- Arrow keys/ wasd to move around
- Down/ S to duck and block incoming damage
- Down/ S + Movement key to shoot an energy ball that can't be blocked
- Shift/ Tab + Movement key to dash

Shooting or dashing costs stamina. Move on 4 consecutive beats to regain stamina!
